website_summaries.verdict: An easy-to-use mold test kit that also includes testing at a lab.
pros: Includes 3 tape-lift strips to test for suspected mold or dust that could contain mold
The cost of the kit includes test results from a lab that arrive quickly
You can also call and ask questions after you receive results
cons: You do have to pay to ship the test results to the lab

customer_reviews.title: undecided how much it is worth
customer_reviews.text: Good result but What I find silly. you pay beaucoup money for this and they can't even provide a return paid envelope to send the test strips back. What the result tells you is very general. you have these type of mold, they may be toxic or not. I knew i had mold, i really wanted to know if it is toxic. the positive is: I now know I don't have the worst most toxic mold
customer_reviews.author: GinaC

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth the Cost
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended. I've tried other mold kits of the "swab" variety with mixed results (the results contained too much "noise"). This sampling method was much easier. At first I was concerned I'd be picking up too much dust but the results, none-the-less, came back with descriptions of the mold content. This was well worth the cost as MOLDetect spent time on the phone describing my results and the possible causes. I can't imagine this type of customer service from other industries or products.
customer_reviews.author: Erica Nowicki

customer_reviews.title: Accurate, professional and clear results.
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly Professional! The kit was easy to use! 1. Mailed back the sample (my stamp) 2. About a week and a half later I received a very comprehensive report. This report included background information, context, and even considerations for different types of treatment methods/remediation. 3. I have a very clear understanding of possible mold in my crawl space as a result of this test. 4. Completely satisfied with this product and recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: markbc

customer_reviews.title: The samples are easy to take and the company processes them right away
customer_reviews.text: The samples are easy to take and the company processes them right away! I had my results in less than a week after sending them off. They give you a report indicating the types of mold observed, the approximate quantity, and indications of whether or not the mold is actively growing. They even let you know if they see other things, like dust mites or insect parts. I had the latter two on a new piece of furniture that I stored in my garage space for only a month or so. They also send you a booklet explaining the results when they send your personal test results.
customer_reviews.author: JitWit

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, wealth of information
customer_reviews.text: I was very impressed with this mold test. It was easy to use, but precise and clear in its instructions. The results you get are detailed and come with useful educational materials (easier than googling every single scientific name). I will share a tip though -- you MUST check your spam folder for the emailed results. That's where mine where, and I was thinking that they never arrived. I'm planning to buy the kit again to re-test after cleanup, and also to test outdoor mold to get a sense of comparables.
customer_reviews.author: s_jm_sf

customer_reviews.title: Happy with our purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Mold detect was great and super easy to do! We tested 3 rooms with our kit and found out exactly what we needed to clean up the problem. We got results fast and they were very informative. Im considering purchasing a second kit in a month or so to see if we have taken care of the problem. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jess*

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quick service. Very professional. Comes with a return envelope. Recieved results in 6 days. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: robfo

customer_reviews.title: Found mold when an air test did not
customer_reviews.text: Tells you the name of the particular mold/fungus as well as severity on a 1-5 level. Did an air test in 2017 which found absolutely no mold, whereas this test did. I spoke to Mike on the phone and he was extremely knowledgeable with culprit and was able to refer me to some places who could help find and rid me of the issue. My work still in progress. Very highly recommend this company and kit.
customer_reviews.author: K Pro

customer_reviews.title: Great home mold test
customer_reviews.text: I did my samples and sent them in. Within a few days I got a detailed report regarding all 3 samples at no EXTRA charge. Some places charge you per $35.00 per sample. Moldetect doesn’t do that. It is one flat fee for the kit. This company sent me an email detailing what was found in my samples and a booklet. If you think you have a problem with mold this test is quick, easy and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: DebHemp

customer_reviews.title: Great product..very happy I bought it
customer_reviews.text: This test was easy and clear and the report was unbelievably thorough. I also called the lab afterwards with some extra questions and they were helpful, thorough and friendly. Before I bought these I looked up the lab and owner and they have great credentials. They also do outside work, not just these internet tests. The info they sent me was extremely helpful and this is a lot cheaper than if I had called someone to my home. I would definitely use them again if I ever needed this service again. I bout the 3 pack by the way. It was worth it in the end!
customer_reviews.author: Valentina Basile

customer_reviews.title: But the test was easy to use and the lab techs were extremely helpful ...
customer_reviews.text: This set of three test strips helped me identify a particular toxic mold that wasn't visible to the eye but which was the cause for my chronic cough. Now, the challenge has been finding the source of the mold! That's another problem. But the test was easy to use and the lab techs were extremely helpful when I called them to help me sort out my results.
customer_reviews.author: Honeybear’s Mom

customer_reviews.title: This worked
customer_reviews.text: This test kit is expensive but it convinced my landlord that we had a problem. Much to my dismay, we found black mold in two of the three areas tested but because of the professional results, our landlord had no questions and mediated these immediately. Would order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Billie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The product performed exactly as advertised. 7/30/17 - As a follow-up to my original review, the seller offered some additions to my order. I can say the service is nothing but outstanding. I would recommend to all my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: DavidR

customer_reviews.title: Best Mold Test
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mold test I have found. The sticky tabs are flexible so you can sample in a corner or a recessed surface which could not be reached with a stiff microscope slide. The results come back only a few days after shipping and you can call the company and they will explain the results. Highly recommended and worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Cole

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this kit because I had mold in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kit because I had mold in my basement, but I didn't know if it was harm full mold, after getting the lab report back I found out it was. I had called them and they tool me what to do to rid it Very pleasant to talk to ---thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. Precise descriptive results. Very easy to understand, and delivered in a timely manner. The representatives communicate efficiently- they let me know when they had received the product as well as when I could expect my report. They delivered as promised! I was disappointed to find we have mold, but glad that MOLDetect has created a reliable product that advised what molds we have, the dangers & risks involved- as well as helpful tips on how to remedy the toxic issue.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny Maxwell Brown

customer_reviews.title: Good product but not perfect
customer_reviews.text: Decent test with decent customer service however I'm not so sure it isn't accurate measure of mold spores in the air. I definitely have a mold issue and it was only registering a 1. It did however show what types of mold were involved.
customer_reviews.author: Denise HTop Contributor: Harmonicas

customer_reviews.title: Best mold/allergen test out there -- a gamechanger
customer_reviews.text: My house was pretty much a haven for every allergen and mold in existence, and thanks to MOLDetect, am finally cleaning it out thanks to them identifying the problems and problem areas. Test is easy to perform and also highly effective -- could not ask for anything more. And great customer service/feedback as well. Nice to see a company that cares about its clients and keeps customers happy. Would recommend to anyone and everyone who is looking to purify the air in their home.
customer_reviews.author: A guy

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Results were fast and detected several types of mold. I would use again.
customer_reviews.author: KirkHere2

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent service. I got the results back in a week. The information provided is very easy to understand.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and quick comprehensive results
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other brands of DIY mold kits (including the brand DIY Mold Kit), this one provides you with a much better report which is more comprehensive and detailed. Despite being a little more expensive than DIY mold kit, I would recommend this one any day.

customer_reviews.title: Quick, accurate results
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with the quick response of the results in email form, as well as, snail mail. We had no problems in collecting the sample, submitting or obtaining the results.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Maule

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use, easy to understand, and quick results!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and quick results! I was even able to talk with someone on Saturday! I’m sure that I will being their kits in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Ole Blu

customer_reviews.title: Grateful
customer_reviews.text: This test saved me from buying a home that was moldy. I am so grateful.

customer_reviews.title: Personal :Lab Tech Advice
customer_reviews.text: Made by a company that gives you personal advice and tips, with lab techs you can talk to, unlike some of the bigger companies/mold test kits out there!
customer_reviews.author: Bug J

customer_reviews.text: No petrie dishes and weird test... Just take the supplied sticker and use it to collect. 3 samples. Easy and fairly inexpensive. Good report back.
customer_reviews.author: ComputerGuy Salem Oregon

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised, I am going to use it against my slum lord

customer_reviews.text: Followthrough has been poor. Have not yet received lab results.

customer_reviews.text: The Moldetect test kit is easy to use and the customer service was very helpful in explaining concerns I had. I would highly recommend them.

customer_reviews.text: Test was very easy to use and the results were very fast! I highly recommend. Results were issued with a lot of information via email.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: completed tests very quickly and provided more information than I anticipated

customer_reviews.text: Easy directions. Fantastic customer service. Results were quick and very easy to understand. Great company. Would definitely use them again and recommend to anyone who wants honest and quick test results!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, quick response, very detailed!!!! Happy with product!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Quick response. Easy to use. Thank you for delivering what you advertise!

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Clear instructions; easy to use; quick and easy to understand results.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Bohl

customer_reviews.title: No better alternative for the
customer_reviews.text: Always a very timely and accurate response. No better alternative for the money
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Grigg

customer_reviews.title: Great Value and Excellent Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This was a very cost effective alternative to getting reliable mold test results. I used this kit to get an initial result for a home I was purchasing. The results were turned around just one day after the lab receiving them and gave me an early indication of the problems with this house. The provided report from the lab was very helpful and informative and their communication with me when I had followup questions was excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Martin C.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very fast on getting results. We had a few questions and Mike helped us out.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna

customer_reviews.title: Finally, mysterious allergy symptoms SOLVED
customer_reviews.text: The test requires a surface that you think is infected with mold to test, and I really had no idea how to get this. Well, I just found some dirty spots in the rooms I was having an allergic reaction to, and low and behold they contained a few species of mold known to cause allergies and some, possibly even toxins. This kit does not instruct you how to kill or fix the mold, but finding the issue is just the first step.
customer_reviews.author: A. Graveley

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful test
customer_reviews.text: Easy to perform test that gave me info about fungal growth in 3 areas of my house. Very helpful for confirming why I am so ill.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend this test kit
customer_reviews.text: I found the MOLDDetect test kit simple to use and I received the results fast. I would recommend this test kit.
customer_reviews.author: Over 65 in Texas

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Accurate readings, easy to use, thorough report and you can even talk to someone about questions you have at their toll free number.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R.

customer_reviews.title: Received results quickly and with a booklet on how to ...
customer_reviews.text: Received results quickly and with a booklet on how to interpret. More expensive than the big box store sample kits, and have more confidence in this one, but can't really be sure how accurate it is.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce M

customer_reviews.title: The reports were swiftly delivered by email and post but ...
customer_reviews.text: The reports were swiftly delivered by email and post but the details on the mold species were a bit difficult to interpret.
customer_reviews.author: Karee

customer_reviews.title: I hate that I spent this amount of money for this
customer_reviews.text: My review so far.... I got this because everyone in the reviews raved about how fast they received their results. Not me, I sent the samples 3 weeks ago and just got an email yesterday saying they got it and it will take 2 more weeks for me to get the results. I hate that I spent this amount of money for this.
customer_reviews.author: Solymar6

customer_reviews.title: so I wasted my money
customer_reviews.text: The kit was missing the information on how to get rid of the mold. Had to look it up myself on the government EPA. Eh... eventually I just had the mold cleaned without sending in any scrapings to be lab analyzed, so I wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: veetee

product_meta.title: MOLDetect - 3 Sample Mold Test Kit W/ AIHA Accredited Lab Analysis
product_meta.description: DIY TEST KIT ANALYZED BY AN ACCREDITED LABORATORY! This reliable DIY mold test kit helps to confirm or rule out indoor mold growth and identify the mold types present (including black/toxic mold--Stachybotrys). Using custom-made sticky tapes, the surface tape lift method is able to detect all spores. This method is more reliable than slower culture methods that require growth on culture media (culture media may or may not have proper nutrients for the relevant molds to grow). Samples are analyzed by highly trained Lab Professionals using direct microscopy. Results are sent back 2-3 days after receipt in the lab. An Information Booklet is also provided with potential health effects from the spores identified, how to prevent mold, cleaning tips, and additional resources. Excellent customer service.Please see website: MOLDetect.com. If you don't see any visible mold you can collect dust from a horizontal surface that hasn't been recently dusted in the area of concern. To do this you take the tape lift and touch it and/or drag it on dust so that there is a visible deposit of dust on the tape window. The idea is that if there is a significant mold contamination issue the mold spores will typically become airborne and then settle on horizontal surfaces. We then analyze the dust sample and let you know if there are significant amounts of abnormal 'indicator' spores which typically are only found inside when there is a indoor mold contamination. One other place you can test to see if you have any abnormal mold in your home is the furnace filter (if you have central air). This is ideal because if there is significant mold in the home the spores will become airborne and eventually make their way through return air ducts and pass through the furnace filter. Testing the furnace filter is more of a general screening of the home but is a good place to test if you don't know where there is a source of mold.
feature_bullets: Now Analyzed by an AIHA-LAP, LLC Laboratory!! Offering Accredited Analysis!
Easy Instructions With Materials For Surface Sample Mold Tests in 3 separate locations
Easy tape lift method detects living & dead spores, both which are detrimental to health
Can sample visible mold, suspect mold, or settled dust (to detect nearby hidden mold growth)
All Materials included. Results back in 2-3 business days after receipt in lab.
